name: Yet Another squid game
description:
project created in an educational way.

https://www.youtube.com/c/AverageDev

Just thought of making a stylized version of a level from squid game. Instead of the creepy feel of the OG game, i decided to make a stylized version of the game. Hope you enjoy.
And yeah RAGDOLL for player is there !!

Please go to this link to find my youtube channel. Please consider giving a like and a subscribe https://www.youtube.com/c/AverageDev
